document.description: Sushi Condiments The important seasonings ... This is a kind of sushi "fast-food" restaurant in ... sushi comes near you, then you pick up the plates from the moving table.

All Nyack Listings Nyack Restaurants
- Japanese&Sushi
Murasaki 845-358-3222 Murasaki, a Japanese restaurant, is located at 138 Main Street, Nyack, NY 10960. Wasabi "Japanese and Sushi" 845-358-7977? Wasabi, serving Japanese cuisine and sushi, is located at 110 Main Street, Nyack NY 10960, Rockland County in the Hudson River Valley. Restaurant Features Outdoor dining on sidewalk
The word is The best sushi; serving rolls that are inspired, creative and superb, but it comes at a high price. Also in Category: Outdoor Dining
All Pearl River Listings Pearl River Restaurants
- Japanese&Sushi
Kumo Japanese Bistro 845-920-0886 Kumo Japanese Bistro, serving Japanese cuisine and sushi, is located at 22 South Main Street, Pearl River, NY 10965, Rockland County in the lower-Hudson Valley. The word is The "decor is trendy and fresh" at this "beautiful restaurant" serving excellent Japanese dishes and sushi "prepared from the freshest ingredients". They even have a good wine selection.
All Piermont Listings Piermont Restaurants
- Japanese&Sushi
Hinode Japanese Restaurant 845-359-4003 Hinode Japanese Restaurant is located at 55 Route 9W Piermont, Rockland County NY 10968.
